name: declare
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: declare
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to announce something clearly, firmly, publicly, or officially

example.eg: They declared their support for the proposal
example.egtrans: 他们宣布支持这个提议。

example.eg: She declared (that) it was the best chocolate cake she had ever tasted.
example.egtrans: 她说那是她吃过的最好的巧克力蛋糕。

example.eg: America declared war on Japan in 1941 (= announced officially that it was at war).
The government has declared war on (= announced that thaey intended to stop) the drug dealers.
The country declared independence in 1952 (= announced that it was no longer under the control of another country).

trans_examp.trans_en: to officially tell someone the value of goods you have bought, or the amount of money you have earned because you might have to pay tax
trans_examp.trans_cn: 申报（应纳税的货物价值或收入）

example.eg: You have to declare any earnings over a certain amount.
example.egtrans: 收入在超过了一定数字后需要申报。

dsense.name: declare
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: If a cricket team declares, they stop batting (= hitting the ball) because they think they already have enough runs (= points) to win.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （板球比赛中，一方因已达足够分数获胜而在一局未结束前的）宣布停止击球，宣布结束赛局

example.egtrans: 巴基斯坦队在第7局获得350分后宣布结束赛局。
